projects.name: EDUQUEST
projects.description: EduQuest is a role-based learning platform with separate teacher and student experiences. It allows teachers to create and manage courses while students can enroll, browse content, and track progress. This was my graduation project, combining real-time data fetching, authentication, and a responsive UI to deliver a seamless educational experience.

projects.name: The Wild Oasis
projects.description: A modern hotel management dashboard. It allows hotel staff to manage bookings, guests, and cabins efficiently through an intuitive interface. It includes features like authentication, filtering, sorting, and data visualization.

projects.name: The Wild Oasis Website
projects.description: A modern cabin booking website where guests can explore luxurious cabins, view details, and make online reservations. The site focuses on elegant design, smooth navigation, and a delightful user experience. It features authentication, booking management, and responsive design.

projects.name: Natours
projects.description: This API powers a complete tour booking platform, built with a focus on security, reliability, and real-world production standards. It includes user authentication with role-based access, payment handling, and a management system for tours and reviews. The system is protected against common web vulnerabilities. It also provides fully documented endpoints.
